translations: vt.祝贺，恭喜；庆贺（congratulate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I congratulated them all on their results.
sentences.translation: 我为他们取得的成就向他们所有人表示祝贺。

sentences.sentence: She congratulated him on the birth of his son.
sentences.translation: 她对他儿子的出生表示了祝贺。

sentences.sentence: We congratulated them on the successful completion of the project.
sentences.translation: 我们祝贺他们工程顺利竣工。
